title: Is Red Wine the Fountain of Youth?
description:
How does the antioxidant resveratrol help our longevity genes, and how much of what kind of alcohol should we really be drinking to optimize its affect? Plus, the protein conversation: how much, what kind, and how to stay balanced.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
